mapper.insert: insert into CORE_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT (SERIALNO, A_APPLY_NO, CONTACTS_RELATION, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_MOBILE, FUNDUNITNO, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME) values (#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CORE_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT set A_APPLY_NO = #{aApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_RELATION = #{contactsRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_NAME = #{contactsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_MOBILE = #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNDUNITNO = #{fundUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANORGCODE = #{loanOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGINTIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, A_APPLY_NO, CONTACTS_RELATION, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_MOBILE, FUNDUNITNO, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME from CORE_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT where SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
